DOC.brief_summary: Effects of hCG replacement therapy on metabolic syndrome parameters in hypogonadotrophic hypogonadism.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Gonadotropin Replacement Therapy in Patients With Hypogonadism
DOC.criteria: Serum testosterone concentration < 300ng/dL Absence of a pituitary or hypothalamic mass lesions, Presence of gonadotropin response to GnRH, Previous androgen treatment, diabetes mellitus, arterial hypertension other hormone deficiencies
